title: Parashant Grand Canyon-Parashant National Monument: Donate
body: Donate       You can donate directly to the monument by sending a check to the Superintendent, Grand Canyon-Parashant National Monument, 345 East Riverside Drive, St. George, UT 84790. No administrative costs will be withheld and your donation is tax deductible. Your gift will help maintain park trails, restore fragile habitat, protect rare and endangered species, and preserve cultural sites. Your donation will also support youth programs.  Please direct additional questions to Shirley Kodele at (435) 688-3374. You can also help the monument and learn more about this area by purchasing books and other items from Dixie-Arizona Strip Interpretive Association. Merchandise can be purchased online at www.d-asia.org or by phone at (435) 688-3200.
